pageContext.description: Edges rough: 2 of the 3 rivet-holes torn. Slight split on one side.
pageContext.patina: Pale brown flecked with grey on one side; on the other the edges are similar, and the centre is grey. Brownish green.
pageContext.publications: I.F. Head, Early Man in S. Bucks., 1955, Fig. 15
pageContext.site: England,Buckinghamshire,Wendover (near),Aston Hill, Halton,On the South East slope of Halton Hill "about half way down below the Golf Club House.",June 1935
pageContext.remarks: Inacc.,"Other things" have been found in the locality, Halton Hill has the vestiges of a camp.,See new index.
